name: SimplyIrieRadio
0:
”Alexa, play Simply Irie Radio”
”Alexa, open Simply Irie Radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: simply irie radio
des: Experience the soul of Kingston, Jamaica, with our station, broadcasting 24/7, 365 days a year from the heart of Spanish Town. We offer a perfect blend of Dancehall and Reggae music, engulfing you in intoxicating rhythms and melodies carried by our live DJs, delivering the best tunes around the clock. Stay current and grooving with real-time updates and exclusive dubplates, all sourced from the bustling streets of Kingston. Whether you are a music aficionado or simply want to engage with the spirit of the Caribbean, our platform welcomes you to feel the essence of this iconic musical scene. Join us and let the beats and vibes of Kingston take over your soul, no matter where you are in the world.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
